eu.geclipse.core.internal.model
Class GridRoot

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.runtime.PlatformObject
      eu.geclipse.core.model.impl.AbstractGridElement
          eu.geclipse.core.model.impl.AbstractGridContainer
              eu.geclipse.core.model.impl.ResourceGridContainer
                  eu.geclipse.core.internal.model.GridRoot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGridContainer, IGridElement, IGridModelNotifier, IGridRoot, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable
public final class GridRoot
extends ResourceGridContainer
implements IGridRoot

Core implementation of the IGridRoot interface. This Grid root is associated with the underlying IWorkspaceRoot.

public static final GridRoot getInstance()
Get the singleton instance of this Grid root. If the singleton is not yet instantiated this method will instantiate it.

Get the GridNotificationService that is used to notify model listeners about changes in the model.

Returns:
The models notification service.

getParent

public IGridContainer getParent()
Description copied from interface: IGridElement
Get the parent element of this element. The parent can only be an IGridContainer. This method may not return null since the only element that is allowed to return null is the IGridRoot which is a singleton and is internally defined within the model.

Specified by:
getParent in interface IGridElement
Overrides:
getParent in class ResourceGridContainer
Returns:
The parent container of this element.

public static ResourceNotificationService getResourceNotificationService()
Get the ResourceNotificationService that is used to notify the model about changes in the resource tree.

Returns:
The resource notification service.

getRoot

public static final GridRoot getRoot()
Get the singleton instance of this Grid root. If the singleton is not yet instantiated this method will return null.

Returns:
The singleton instance or null if the singleton was not yet instatiated.

canContain

public boolean canContain(IGridElement element)
Description copied from interface: IGridContainer
Determines if this may contain the specified element. This method works type specific, i.e. a container may or may not contain elements of a specified type.

Specified by:
canContain in interface IGridContainer
Overrides:
canContain in class AbstractGridContainer
Parameters:
element - The element that may be contained in this container.
Returns:
If this container may contain the specified element.

findElement

public final IGridElement findElement(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IPath path)
Description copied from interface: IGridRoot
Search the model for an element contained in the specified path. It is therefore assumed that the path is relative to the grid root, i.e. a path that is returned by IGridElement.getPath().

Specified by:
findElement in interface IGridRoot
Parameters:
path - The path pointing to the element.
Returns:
The element or null if no element could be found in the specified path.

findElement

public final IGridElement findElement(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource resource)
Description copied from interface: IGridRoot
Recursively search the root's children for an element that corresponds to the specified IResource.

Specified by:
findElement in interface IGridRoot
Parameters:
resource - The resource that is searched.
Returns:
The grid element that corresponds to the specified resource.

fireGridModelEvent

public void fireGridModelEvent(IGridModelEvent event)
Distribute the specified event to all registered IGridModelListeners.

Parameters:
event - The event to be distributed.

registerElement

public static void registerElement(IGridElement element)
This method is used to register any new element appearing in the model. It takes care that managed elements are added to their manager.

Parameters:
element - The element that appeared somewhere in the model.
